                         throws java.lang.Exception
Initialise the worker based on the configuration.

Parameters:
config - the configuration for the worker.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - when an exception has occurred initialising the worker.

onRequest

public abstract lexa.core.data.DataSet onRequest(lexa.core.data.DataSet request)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
Process the inbound request.
On receipt of a request, the data is validated by this method. If any further request are required, they should be in the returned DataSet. If the return is null then the ProcessAgent will immediately reply.

Parameters:
request - The request data to be processed.
Returns:
a DataSet containing requests to be made to handle the original requests.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - when an exception has occurred handling the request.

onReply

public abstract lexa.core.data.DataSet onReply(lexa.core.data.DataSet request,
                                               lexa.core.data.DataSet replies)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
Process the outbound reply.
When all the forward requests are complete, build the reply DataSet for the caller.

Parameters:
request - the original request
replies - the replies to all request made.
Returns:
a DataSet to send to the client.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - when an exception has occurred handling the request.
